sources.title: AppFolio FTC Settlement Statement - AppFolio Property Management
sources.snippet: AppFolio has reached a settlement with the Federal Trade Commission that resolves all purported claims and allegations stemming from the previously disclosed investigation of AppFolio's tenant background screening services business. AppFolio did not admit any wrongdoing in the settlement but nevertheless agreed to pay $4.25 million to avoid protracted litigation and potential distraction ...

sources.title: Do you use Appfolio? : r/PropertyManagement - Reddit
sources.snippet: New users of Appfolio are not given the option to do NACHA files, so they can charge the echeck price for all online payments to owners. Or so we were told. Appfolio has so many "value add" revenue streams coming in, they had a lot of other options to increase revenue without upsetting the apple cart and still covering inflation costs.
